function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through community wastewater","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases in the population","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and analysis of wastewater, implementation of appropriate treatment and disinfection measures","Technologies":"Wastewater surveillance tools, modelling and computational analysis","People":"Large-scale population, asymptomatic and symptomatic individuals","Owner":"Public health authorities, wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Reliance on WBE as the sole surveillance tool","Impact":"Missed detection of contagious cases, leading to uncontrolled spread","Mitigation":"Integration of WBE with clinical screening, validation of WBE results","Technologies":"Wastewater surveillance tools, clinical screening technologies","People":"Public health authorities, clinical laboratories","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Low ethics in using WBE","Impact":"Privacy concerns, potential misuse of WBE data","Mitigation":"Clear communication about data usage and privacy protection, adherence to ethical guidelines","Technologies":"Ethical guidelines, privacy protection measures","People":"Community members, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"}]}
